question: Which council is to establish the Aerospace and Defence Industry Group to boost bilateral cooperation ?
explanation: The UK India Business Council (UKIBC) on November 29,2019 announced the establishment of the Aerospace and Defence Industry Group to boost bilateral cooperation in the areas. A memorandum of understanding on \'defence technology industrial capability cooperation\' was signed between the UK and India which highlighted the UK government\'s approach towards enhancing cooperation with India, and the defence vertical is an example of how this cooperation is being taken to a new level.
